<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120260</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120260</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kotaljenje po klancu</string>
            <string language="en">Rolling down an Incline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rollen hinunter eine Abdachung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Roulement en bas d'une pente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rolar abaixo um incline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rotolando giù una pendenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να κυλήσει κάτω μια κλίση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El rodar abajo de una pendiente</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Kolo se kotali po klancu navzdol pri tem se potencialna energija pretvori v translacijsko kinetično in vrtilno kinetično energijo.</string>
            <string language="en">The wheel is rolling downhill and its potencial energy is transformed into translational kinetic energy and angular kinetic energy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kinetična energija</string>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vrtilna kinetična energija</string>
            <string language="en">angular kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vrtenje</string>
            <string language="en">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Rad rollt abwärts und seine potencial Energie
wird in translational kinetische Energie und in eckige kinetische 
Energie umgewandelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La roue roule en descendant et sa énergie 
potencial est transformée en énergie cinétique de translation et 
énergie cinétique angulaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A roda está rolando para baixo e sua energia 
potencial é transformada na energia cinética translational e na 
energia cinética angular.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La rotella sta rotolando in discesa e la relativa 
energia potencial è trasformata in energia cinetica translational ed 
in energia cinetica angolare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ρόδα κυλά προς τα κάτω και η potencial ενέργειά 
της μετασχηματίζεται στη μεταφραστική κινητική ενέργεια και τη 
γωνιακή κινητική ενέργεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La rueda está rodando cuesta abajo y su energía 
potencial se transforma en energía cinética de translación y 
energía cinética angular.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">eckige kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umdrehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie cinétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie cinétique angulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia cinética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia cinética angular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rotação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia cinetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia cinetica angolare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rotazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κινητική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνιακή κινητική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιστροφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía cinética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía cinética angular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rotación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
